Name: (Custom) Heroes of the Voice Machine (PROGRESSIVE)
Description: The adventure begins.. take a chance, roll the dice.
Longdesc:
Many thanks to TheGrayAlien!
This is a rebuild of BobtheBunnys Legend of the Voice Machine mod with the leveling features of the DemeoRevolutions Progressive mods.

Theme is based on a popular TTRPG stream by a bunch of nerdy voice actors and their hit animated series.

Sorcerer
The snarky and witty gunslinger. Descendant of royalty and tragedy, his soul is corrupt.

Guardian
Unsure and often unreliable, but always lovable cleric. She is every bit as much a warrior as a healer.

Barbarian
Muscles, big weapon, yells a lot, and always fond of ale. He would like to rage.

Bard
Gird your loins and tap your toes, this clever artist can weave melodies and magic to aid his friends in battle.

Hunter
A powerful druid if she had more confidence in herself. Her people count on her to lead some day, but for now just try not to die.

Assassin
Move fast and strike with dagger-dagger-dagger. He's got a few tricks up his sleeve and feathers in his cloak.

Warlock
Archer with a pet bear. Which one has a more pleasant attitude? You wont have time to ask before you are marked for death.
